question.questionText: Pam and her family were planning a hike. Pam found 2 maps of the same area. Her friend recommended she use the topographic map when they went to the lake. Why would Pam's friend recommend using the topographic map for the hike?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: She recommended the topographic map because the map shows the elevations along the trail. Pam would know where the trail was the steepest.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: It tells you the elevation so you hike the easiest way.
